entry.title: VivekBhawsar18/chatbot-widget-integration: A lightweight JavaScript widget for integrating Atai chatbot into any website using an iframe. This script creates a floating chatbot button that toggles a chatbot window, ensuring seamless embedding and a smooth user experience.
entry.content: A lightweight JavaScript widget for integrating Atai chatbot into any website using an iframe. This script creates a floating chatbot button that toggles a chatbot window, ensuring seamless embedding and a smooth user experience.

entry.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more.
